#summary Video in freeswitch

= Introduction =

mod_fsv implements functions to record and play back video in FreeSWITCH. 


= Details =

To include mod_fsv in freeswitch : 
<li>edit modules.conf located in usr/local/src/freeswitch and uncomment applications/mod_fsv.</li>
<li>make freeswitch again by *make* and then *make install*.</li>
<li>check usr/local/freeswitch/conf/autoload_configs and make sure that mod_fsv module is loaded in file modules.conf.xml.</li>
<li>Include video codecs in freeswitch by editing vars.xml in usr/local/freeswitch/conf - 
<li><X-PRE-PROCESS cmd="set" data="global_codec_prefs=G7221@32000h,G7221@16000h,G722,PCMU,PCMA,GSM,H263,H263-1998,H264"/></li>
<li><X-PRE-PROCESS cmd="set" data="outbound_codec_prefs=PCMU,PCMA,GSM,H263,H263-1998,H264"/></li>
</li>
